```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

x <- tibble(val = read_lines(here("day_20", "test.txt"))) %>% 
  extract(val, into = "id", regex = "(Tile \\d+)", remove = FALSE) %>%
  fill(id) %>% 
  extract(val, into = "tile", regex = "([\\.|#]+)") %>% 
  filter(!is.na(tile)) %>% 
  nest(data = c(tile))
```
